pages.text: Imbuing allows you to enhance your tools and weapons with magical properties.
Make sure you have the required materials for the imbuing process.
Once ready, place your item on the imbuing altar to start the enchantment.
Tools can be enhanced to improve efficiency and durability.
Weapons like swords gain extra power when imbued.
Arrows can also be enchanted to carry magical effects.
Armour pieces provide better protection with enchantments.
Follow the magical patterns carefully to successfully imbue your equipment.
